Tallywallet - a Money framework in Python¶

Tallywallet’s mission is to provide a validated Pythonic framework for finance, money trading and economic applications.

The API may change significantly as the project proceeds. At this early stage, you should only use the latest release, which may not be compatible with previous versions.

  • The time value of money
  • A tutorial on currency exchange
  • A simple Keen Monetary Circuit simulation
  • API Reference

  • Search Page

  • Index

If you’ve spotted a bug in Tallywallet, please let me know so I can fix it. If you think Tallywallet lacks a feature, you can help drive development by describing your Use Case.

In either event, please leave a message on the project’s message board.
